mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "RENT" VALUES(SEQ_RENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{rentDate}, #{expectDate}, DEFAULT, NULL, ${memberNo}, SEQ_PAY_NO.CURRVAL)
mapper.update: UPDATE "MEMBER_BADGE" SET BADGE_FL = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BADGE_NO = 10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "PURCHASE" VALUES(SEQ_PURCHASE_NO.NEXTVAL, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ${memberNo}, SEQ_PAY_NO.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM "PAY" JOIN RENT USING(PAY_NO) JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE PAY_NO = (SELECT MAX(PAY_NO) FROM "PAY") AND MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
